nodes.text: Kyramla Gemas'rugam—"Deadly Hairball" in Mando'a—was the name given to a jungle wampa that Shae Vizla's Mandalorians kept on Tracyn Island on the planet Rishi. The wampa guarded the gate to the Mandalorians' compound, and was slain by a group of independent operatives who came to see Vizla.

Kyramla Gemas'rugam first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The wampa is the first boss in the Blood Hunt Tactical Flashpoint.
